snippet: Allegations of misconduct in Colombia have brought renewed scrutiny to an agency that thought it had shed a salacious reputation.
abstract: Secret Service, a government agency that appeared to have finally shed its former salacious reputation, is facing renewed scrutiny over allegations of misconduct involving prostitution in Cartagena, Colombia.

byline.original: By MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT and ERIC LICHTBLAU

lead_paragraph: Allegations of misconduct in Colombia have brought renewed scrutiny to an agency that thought it had shed a salacious reputation.

headline.seo: Secret Service Faces New Scandal After Working to Improve Image
headline.main: After Refining Image, New Scandal for Secret Service
headline.print_headline: After Refining Image, New Scandal for Secret Service
